Text: Income Tax Amendments Act, 2006:  The long form title of the bill is "An Act to amend the Income Tax Act, including amendments in relation to foreign investment entities and non-resident trusts, and to provide for the bijural expression of the provisions of that Act".

2:
--------------------
Text: Income Tax Amendments Act, 2006:  Among a 600-page list of minor changes to tax law, the bill contains a clause, "Section 120(3)(b)", that would give the government power to deny taxation benefits for films made in Canada if the government deems the content to be objectionable.
